text: There are 3 companies offering boat tour cruise. One is 30minutes while the other two offers 45minutes.
We went as the sun was setting,so it looked quiet ,but waterfront became busy after a while. Good eating places, kids activities and we enjoyed a short but sweet boat trip around the harbor

Always a pleasure to visit the Marina at Puteri Harbour. You can take a nice stroll around the perimeter of the Marina. I visited a couple of times a few years back before covid, and back in 2015.

Just visited recently in 2024, and was shocked to find out that most shops & F&Bs have closed for about a year now - all started when hotel Jen shut its operations. The entire bustling area where hotel Jen used to be is now a ghost town. All the shops have closed down permanently, was a little sad to find out as the area was really nice.

The wind therr is strong , which is really relaxing and helps me to blow off some steam ðŸ¤Ž there's lots of food stalls as well there, but the price is not really reasonable and the hygiene conditions were a bit concerning ... My fam and I didn't eat there, but the place was quite a vibe ! Will suggest you to go when it's a bit later , maybe around 7-8 pm to enjoy the night performances ! Overall nice place to walk around and enjoy the breeze ~
Really nice pop up market over Christmas and until tomorrow. Lots of local tourists/visitors here so it's pretty lively.
